title: Data Scientist Intern
summary: Supported a data scientist to improve NLP models and data pipelines, and contributed to production deployment of models and multi-channel messaging infrastructure.

company.name: Like A Bird
company.description: Startup specialized in deploying and configuring turnkey chatbots for various sectors: e-commerce, industry, human resources, and events.

projects.name: Scraping pipelines and NLP model training
projects.description: Design and deployment of distributed scraping pipelines and neural network models for conversational processing.
responsibilities: Designed and deployed distributed scraping pipelines.
Designed LSTM architectures for conversational processing.
Analyzed and evaluated models in production.
Deployed and automated the model lifecycle on AWS.
projects.impact: Built a technical foundation to quickly train and deploy NLP models tailored to client needs.

projects.name: Multi-channel message processing platform
projects.description: Built a message processing platform for Twitter, Facebook, Discord, and web plugins, with very low latency.
responsibilities: Developed webhooks for Twitter, Facebook, Discord, and web plugins.
Implemented the NLP routing and orchestration engine.
Designed and maintained the SQL data model (PostgreSQL).
Built an asynchronous sending module for multiple channels.
projects.impact: Very low-latency chatbot infrastructure using state-of-the-art ML models, enabling large-scale commercial operations on social networks.

title: Junior Data Scientist
summary: Owned the backend and MLOps pipelines for continuous NLP model improvement, from data collection to deployment and performance monitoring.

company.name: Like A Bird
company.description: Startup specialized in deploying and configuring turnkey chatbots for various sectors: e-commerce, industry, human resources, and events.

projects.name: Continuous NLP model improvement platform
projects.description: Industrialized the full ML lifecycle: collection, annotation, training, deployment, and monitoring, around BERT/GPT models on SageMaker.
responsibilities: Fine-tuned advanced NLP models (BERT, GPT) on internal datasets.
Built reproducible training pipelines on AWS SageMaker.
Deployed models on SageMaker using custom Docker images.
Developed a backend exposing conversation data for continuous improvement.
Collected client annotations to enrich datasets.
Orchestrated ML steps (training, evaluation, inference) via SageMaker.
projects.impact: Delivered an automated NLP performance improvement system, drastically reducing time from bug detection to fix and improving chatbot answer quality.

links.label: AWS France article on the SageMaker pipeline

projects.name: AWS communications and experience report
projects.description: Contributed to writing and presenting a detailed experience report with AWS teams.
responsibilities: Co-authored a technical article describing the NLP pipeline on SageMaker.
Presented best practices to the ML community with AWS.
Contributed to Like A Bird visibility in the ML community.
projects.impact: Strengthened Like A Bird credibility and positioned it as a flagship SageMaker use case.

title: Data and AI Engineer
summary: Designed and built data, BI, AI, and chatbot solutions to modernize internal tools, automate client needs analysis, and improve data usage.

company.name: Qantis
company.description: Purchasing group supporting French SMEs in negotiating preferential rates with multiple suppliers. Qantis acquired Like A Bird in 2022.

projects.name: RAG chatbots and intelligent search
projects.description: Built chatbots and search tools using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), with a unified search engine across multiple public sources.
responsibilities: Developed RAG-based chatbots.
Designed a unified search engine.
Centralized and queried data from many public sites.
Exposed services via API.
projects.impact: Reduced commercial research time and significantly improved responsiveness during RFQs.

projects.name: SMS satisfaction survey platform
projects.description: Designed a scalable platform for sending satisfaction surveys for large construction industry clients.
responsibilities: Designed the platform architecture.
Implemented a large-scale asynchronous sending engine in Python.
Managed data persistence in PostgreSQL.
Oversaw system scalability and reliability.
projects.impact: Fully automated a previously manual process and improved customer response rates.

projects.name: Datalake and BI pipelines
projects.description: Built a centralized datalake for CRM and other internal sources, with reporting in Power BI.
responsibilities: Designed the centralized datalake.
Integrated CRM and internal data sources.
Stored data in AWS S3.
Queried data via AWS Athena.
Built Power BI dashboards.
projects.impact: Created a consolidated activity view that enabled strategic decision making.

projects.name: Product recommendation system
projects.description: Developed a product recommendation module based on analysis of client consumption histories.
responsibilities: Analyzed consumption histories.
Built a recommendation model.
Implemented XGBoost and Apriori algorithms.
Integrated recommendations into business tools.
projects.impact: Increased commercial opportunities with contextual product suggestions.

projects.name: Automated invoice analysis tool
projects.description: Built a tool to automatically analyze supplier invoices in order to estimate potential savings for prospects.
responsibilities: Automatically extracted and structured invoice data.
Computed pricing gaps.
Estimated potential savings for prospects.
Delivered the tool to sales teams.
projects.impact: Significantly accelerated the sales qualification process and improved conversion rates.

title: Lead Backend and GenAI
summary: Central role in designing a document analysis and payment automation platform using LLMs, with full responsibility for architecture, productionization, and GenAI team structuring.

company.name: iBanFirst
company.description: Fintech scale-up specializing in international payments for SMBs and mid-market companies.

projects.name: LLM-based payment automation POC
projects.description: Designed the first POC to automatically extract all information required to create a payment from an invoice.
responsibilities: Defined the architecture for the document extraction and analysis pipeline.
Led technology selection.
Defined quality standards and model evaluation strategy.
Coordinated with Product and Compliance teams to frame functional and regulatory needs.
projects.impact: Successful demonstration that enabled industrialization and triggered development of the full platform.

projects.name: Payment automation platform
projects.description: Distributed platform that analyzes supplier documents and automatically creates payments with strong reliability, traceability, and scalability constraints.
responsibilities: Designed the distributed architecture and data flows.
Led development of a worker capable of parsing thousands of documents.
Built the automatic payment creation module.
Supervised production rollout and overall system quality.
projects.impact: Drastically reduced payment processing time and significantly limited human errors through reliable automation.

projects.name: Infrastructure, DevOps, and Observability
projects.description: Set up Kubernetes infrastructure, DevOps pipelines, and observability standards for the AI platform.
responsibilities: Supervised Kubernetes deployments with a focus on performance, security, and scalability.
Implemented a full DevOps pipeline via GitHub Actions and ArgoCD.
Defined and deployed observability standards.
Set up monitoring for latency, stability, and error rates.
projects.impact: Highly observable, scalable, and secure platform adopted as a standard by other teams.

projects.name: Quality ownership and backend standards
projects.description: Fully structured software quality and backend standards for the AI team.
responsibilities: Set up a comprehensive testing framework.
Defined backend best practices.
Wrote technical guidelines for the AI/Backend team.
Ensured non-regression and stable releases.
projects.impact: Major improvement in production reliability and faster, safer release cycles.

projects.name: Team leadership and GenAI structuring
projects.description: Built, structured, and upskilled the GenAI team.
responsibilities: Onboarded engineers on a complex multi-technology topic.
Technical mentoring, pair programming, and systematic PR reviews.
Established a structured team cadence (Agile, grooming, technical alignment).
Participated in hiring and defined selection criteria.
Made final hiring decisions.
projects.impact: Built an effective, autonomous, and technically aligned GenAI team capable of delivering complex production features quickly.

title: Co-founder and Lead Product/Tech
summary: Co-founded Tantar, a legal document analysis platform that automatically extracts a structured timeline of a company's legal events. Responsible for product development, technical architecture, and business strategy.

company.name: Tantar
company.description: Company co-founded to help lawyers, legal counsels, and accountants efficiently retrieve key company information from their legal documents.

projects.name: Legal document analysis platform
projects.description: Platform that automatically extracts key legal information and rebuilds a structured timeline of a company's lifecycle.
responsibilities: Designed the overall platform architecture.
Automated legal information extraction via OCR and AI.
Structured legal events into a timeline.
Deployed the platform to production.
projects.impact: Automated legal timeline analysis, providing a clear, immediate, and structured view of a company's history.

projects.name: Document reconciliation and vector database
projects.description: Tool that automatically links legal documents using RAG techniques and a vector database.
responsibilities: Built a document reconciliation engine.
Automatically linked related legal documents.
Set up a vector database for semantic search.
Built a RAG layer for structured data retrieval.
projects.impact: Automatically connected legal documents, significantly improving understanding of complex cases.

projects.name: Backend API and product frontend
projects.description: Developed the full API and product visualization frontend.
responsibilities: Built a full API for document submission and authentication.
Returned extracted information via structured endpoints.
Designed and built the visualization frontend.
Presented the product to clients.
projects.impact: Delivered a usable platform for clients to analyze and visualize legal data.

projects.name: AI agents suite and automatic document grouping
projects.description: Built AI agents able to automatically group documents about the same topic.
responsibilities: Designed AI agents specialized by legal event type.
Automatically grouped documents related to the same topic.
Continuously improved grouping relevance.
projects.impact: Automated thematic grouping of legal documents, easing domain analysis.

projects.name: Strategy, business, and go-to-market
projects.description: Defined product strategy, business model, and led the commercial launch.
responsibilities: Defined the value proposition.
Built the business model.
Handled commercial prospecting and client demos.
Supported the beta testing phase.
Participated in trade shows and sector events.
projects.impact: Clear product positioning in the LegalTech market and validation of the need with early clients.
